title: In-class Exercise 1
text:
Getting Started

Loading R packageImporting PISA dataFiltering Singapore data


In this in-class exercise, two R packages will be used. They are:

tidyverse, and
haven

The code chunk used is as follows:


Code
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,haven)




The code chunk below uses read_sas() of haven to import PISA data into R environment.


Code
stu_qqq <- read_sas("data/cy08msp_stu_qqq.sas7bdat")




The code chunk below uses [filter()] to filter country code of Singapore only


Code
stu_qqq_SG <- stu_qqq %>%
  filter(CNT == "SGP")




Code
write_rds(stu_qqq_SG,
          "data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")




Code
stu_qqq_SG <- read_rds("data/stu_qqq_SG.rds")
